title.jp: Ima wa Furuki Hengoku no Soko: Preteritus Rinbus Woraago

synopsis: Hakuno feels a rage build up inside of him as he lives through the repetitive virtual world of SE.RA.PH, and it fills him with a sense of purpose.
Saber proudly introduces herself and prepares Hakuno for the war ahead. But finding another Master to battle proves to be harder than anticipated.

title.jp: Ougon Shishi to Arashi no Yoru: Golden Wild Hunt

synopsis: Hakuno and Saber meet Rin, a self-proclaimed Resistor. Hakuno learns that he must kill Shinji, the Floor Master, in order to ascend to the next level.

title.jp: Kao no Nai Ou: No Face Mei King

synopsis: After making it to the next level, Hakuno and Saber are immediately ambushed. Just as things seem hopeless, they meet a stranger named Rani VIII.
Rani VIII tells Hakuno about the Floor Master, Dan Blackmore, and they learn why he can never ascend -- no matter how many lives he takes.

title.jp: Eikyuukikan Shoujo Teikoku: Queens Glass Game

synopsis: After ascending to the mysterious third level, Hakuno meets Alice, a cyber ghost living alone in this haunted wonderland.

title.jp: Dareka no Tame no Monogatari: Nursery Rhyme

synopsis: The only way out of the time loop they're trapped in is to defeat Alice. Hakuno is hesitant, despite knowing how many she's killed before.
Rin gets them ready for the fifth level, where a Berserker wanders. Thereâ€™s no floor master, but something perhaps much worse.
